comment: I haven't finished her class, but it has definitely been an experience so far. She has been using AI for her power points, and it repeats itself all the time, it's funny. The thing that has been agitating me though is when she'll randomly go off about politics. She very faintly hides her politics when she talks about it, it's easy to tell her side.

Professor Russell is great. This class is not difficult, but she still makes the lectures engaging and encourages participation in class. Be wary that you attend class, attendance is a pretty massive percentage of your grade (like 20%), so skipping will really hurt you.

Easy class, most of the assignments were questions in the textbook that you could do whenever. There was a midterm and final online, no lockdown. Attendance is a part of your grade. My only issue with her was how off topic she would get during lectures ranting about stuff she doesn't like and the many irrelevant religious and political comments.
Easy A, canceled classes on Wednesdays and only came on Mondays. Attendance wasn't even mandatory, I barely showed up.

I took this professor for COMM 1100, and I really enjoyed it. She's so kind and makes the class easy. Weekly, we had textbook homework (super easy) and a discussion post. She also gave Socrative quizzes (few questions) each lecture for participation grades. There was a midterm, final, and extra credit. If you want an easy A, I highly recommend her!
Super easy class where most of the assignments are online and easy A's. Class has fun lectures but attendance isn't super necessary. I would recommend her to anyone that needs this gen ed.

VERY easy. She is passionate about what she does, provides a lot of personal experience examples and very nice. She provides extra credit opportunities and late work which is all on Revel. She does exit tickets which count as attendance. Exams are long but they are open-note and does not require attendance or lockdown browser.

TAKE HER!!! Suppose to meet 2 days out the week but after like three weeks, we only went on Mondays. She do take attendance since we only go one day out the week. 2 Assignments due every week. Midterm and Final and both online. She was truly wonderful and her class is an easy GPA booster.
Took this professor and I enjoyed it. Learned some interesting stuff from her that it would be my first time hearing and I liked it. Recommend this professor
It is a very easy course; I would imagine it being hard to make this course difficult. She goes off topic a lot. You can get away by paying very minimal attention in class.
Surprisingly interesting class. Good textbook that was assigned and straightforward work. Modules due on Thursdays and chapter work due on Sundays. 2 exams with the final being open note.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: The class was pretty easy, just a lot of reading. Class is mostly on Revel, except the weekly discussion on D2L. Midterm was easy and she uploads questions into socrative for you to study!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: supposed to meet on mondays and wednesdays but after like the first 2-3 weeks we stopped meeting on wednesdays so you only go in once a week. pearson and a discussion post once a week.easy midterm

Lisa was very understanding and helpful. She allowed me to enter her class after drop/add week. She also is very educated and passionate about her work. She makes sure students will use what they learn out into the real world. The only con is the book. The homework book crashed a lot and slowed down randomly, still passed with an A.

Met once a week, and had an online textbook that included all of the quizzes and study material needed for the course. We were really graded on short discussions, the online textbook+quizzes, tests and attendance. All you need to do to pass is show up. Super easy and stress free class, plus she's really personable and cares about her students.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: So this professor I would definitely take again. I only had her 2 days a week but she only met up with us once a week. There is a lot of reading because of the chapters, but she does post the main points on D2L. So the test were definitely easy and it was all taken online with no proctoring. But understand you have to participate in her class.

Its a lot to read, and quizzes for each chapter.  A minimum of five (students have about 13 to choose from) written work about each chapter which can be a discussion post. A mid term and a final. Its a lot of work but getting an A is attainable
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Accessible outside class--Caring

comment: My COM class was 100% asynchronous. However, Professor Russel was always pleasant whenever I had a question or when shed give feedback. Its all quizzes and readings from the Pearson textbook as well as a midterm and the final. Relatively easy class. I usually got all of my work done in a day. Dont take it if you cant handle lots of reading.

Prof. Russell is a very kind woman. She is lenient at the beginning of the semester in regards to late work but after that she won't accept it. That does not matter at all, the work is incredibly easy and valuable content. Quizlet will benefit you... greatly.

Her class is super easy. The answers to her quizzes and tests are literally off of the textbook reading. It is quite a bit of reading each week, and you have quizzes and tests every week. Basically read the textbook and pass.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: She actually made me like coming to class I didnt miss one of her classes the whole semester but shes awesome test are super easy questions come from study guide should be an easy A if you give effort!

Honestly, her tests are the socratives that she posts for review. She does not remember anyone's faces so all you have to do is do the socrative for the day and you will be counted present. Super easy A. Most of the time she's late, or she just cancels class in general.

She is super sweet and sometimes can be pretty funny. Attendence is mandatory but you don't need to be in class to understand the material for the test. She gives a practice test on Socrative which helps tremendously for tests. Sometimes the class is kinda dumb because its mostly common sense stuff but she is a really good teacher.
rating_tags: Caring--Skip class? You won't pass.--Participation matters

comment: Professor Russells class is predominantly graded off of tests and those tests were generally quite easy. Her class was easy but it got annoying at times. Her lectures are basically full of rants about things she doesnt like (that have nothing to do with communications) and offhanded political comments. Attendance was mandatory when I took it
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Prof Russell is great. Make sure you get counted for attendance, tests are super easy because she gives a great study guide through Socrative. Super easy A.
If you don't get in A in this class, drop out... that's how easy her class is
Easiest A ever. Take her. Never in class for more than 30 minutes. super easy tests.

TAKE HER!!! She has a clear syllabus and course schedule. You will need to get REVEL to do the quizzes, but they are easy and a huge grade booster. Attendance is mandatory, and every class has a ticket out the door on socrative. Her tests are pretty easy as long as you do the socrative and study vocab. If you want an A, she is the teacher for you.

BEST TEACHER EVER! Make sure to come to class and pay attention. Her classes are fun and she gives great examples so that the material is easy to relate too. She really cares for her students, and wants everyone to do well. Take her if possible, you wont regret it

Prof. Russell is an amazing professor. Shes just awesome! She doesnt grade roughly. She has lots of extra credit to offer! If you are looking for an easy A, this is the class for you. Shes just very easy to understand and her classes are fun to attend!

By far the easiest class I have ever taken in my entire life. Answers to the exams are, literally, given to you. You still learn valuable information about communication, all while receiving the easiest A of your life! Lisa is silly and fun and she's easy to love!

You really don't even have to show up to class or read the text book to pass this class. Most classes we watched movies or videos and discussed them. Some of the videos were actually pretty interesting. She posts the tests word for word online and definitely cares about the success of her students. Very cool professor.

This is the easiest class I have ever taken.. She has tests and a final, but she posts the tests word for word online.. so do the tests online and you are guaranteed a 100 on the test. I never went to class, but if I did we always watched a couple videos and got out after like 30 minutes
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Such an easy class - it's not even funny. Test questions are from Socrative and the Your Reference chapter summaries on Launchpad. You could miss every single class and still easily get an A. She's a very nice & quirky professor.

Her class is very easy A. Just show to class and do her assignments and you will do fine. Her tests come from tophat. Tophat is not required but about all the questions come from there. The hardest thing in her class is the speech, but the speech is easier than what it looks. You will need the textbook and the workbook.

Professor Russell is a great teacher and made the class interesting. She is very understanding and will work around issues. VERY easy A.  TIP: TopHat isn't required, but she recommends it.  Midterm and Final questions are on TopHat and I found it SOOOO useful for studying. I highly recommend getting it.

She's a very sweet lady and probably my most interesting class of the semester. She's super nice and the workload is rather easy. The only difficult thing about her class was the one group presentation, but even then it wasn't that bad. I would most definitely recommend her class.
She is so nice and willing to help you in anyway to get a good grade in her class. She's very passionate and obviously loves teaching.

Really enjoyed this class. There is a little bit of homework, but you work on it in class together. Workbook is mandatory. Very sweet lady, and really wants you to learn as much as you can in this class and wants you to get as good of a grade as possible and will help you do both. Loved this class, would highly recommend this professor!

Really enjoyed this class. There is a little bit of homework but you work on it in class together. The workbook is mandatory (most hw is in it). She wants you to learn as much as you can in her class and wants you to get the best grade possible and will help you achieve both of these. Great teacher!
She is so nice and very passionate about teaching this. She gives you lots of resources other than the book that will help you. She's very helpful and will work with you how ever she can.

I think she's a great teacher! She was thrown into teacher a class only a few weeks before the semester started but she handled it perfectly! It is a lot of work but she's very lenient with grades. Most of the time she gives you an extra week to complete an assignment past the due date. I would def. retake this prof in a heartbeat!
